name: iframe
description: Display content from another web page in a frame.

actions.name: Navigate to URL
actions.description: Load a new URL in the iframe.

actions.name: Display HTML string
actions.description: Load a string of HTML content in the iframe. Enable sandbox if there is any untrusted content.

params.name: HTML
params.description: A string of HTML content to load. Enable sandbox if there is any untrusted content.
